definition: healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in

sentences.english: If you always have it, your health will be badly affected.
sentences.chinese: 如果你經常喫它，你的健康狀況將受到很大影響。

sentences.english: The Chicago Sun-Times reports that Novak's condition is dire.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥陽光時代雜誌報道說諾瓦科的健康狀況很糟。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate mental health status of only-child nurses.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解獨生子女護士的心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the mental health of prison policemen and the relation between mental health and personality.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究監獄幹警的心理健康狀況及其與人格的關係。

sentences.english: Objective To assess mental health status in psychiatric nurses.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解精神科護士心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: Objective To understand mental health of political cadres.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解公安政工幹部心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: Likewise, his health did not rejuvenate either.
sentences.chinese: 同樣地，他的健康狀況也沒有恢復。

sentences.english: You should go to have the doctor check on your health.
sentences.chinese: 你應當去找醫生檢查一下身體的健康狀況。

sentences.english: Conclusion Generally speaking, the mental health state of enrollee is normal.
sentences.chinese: 結論應徵青年的心理健康狀況總體正常。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the change trend of children health situation in Beijing municipal kindergartens.
sentences.chinese: 探討托幼園所兒童健康狀況的變化趨勢。

sentences.english: Objects: To know the mental health conditions of candidates for postgraduate taken re-examinations in a university.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解某高校參加研究生複試的考生的心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: According to health index, the health state of Nansihu Lake is determined.
sentences.chinese: 根據健康綜合指數，確定南四湖健康狀況。

sentences.english: Objective To find out self-rated health on normal persons.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解一般人羣的自測健康狀況。

sentences.english: To investigate mental health status of different sex farmers along Dian Chi Lake of Jinning county.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解晉寧縣滇池沿岸不同性別農民的心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: This one action alone can make a huge, positive difference in your health.
sentences.chinese: 僅僅早餐這一項就能給你的健康狀況帶來巨大的改善。

sentences.english: I’ve had no exercise for ages；I’m really out of condition.
sentences.chinese: 我已好久沒鍛鍊了，現在健康狀況欠佳。

definition: range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
abbr. for 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
